popover.primary: A mastery path focused on destroying your enemies
A mastery path focused on hindering and crippling your foes
A mastery path focused on supporting and bolstering you and your allies

data.name: All Out Assault!
data.description:
You become filled with the endless power of Myrmidia, dealing 99 Elemental damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
You become filled with the endless power of Myrmidia, dealing {COM_4_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} every {COM_3_FREQ_SECONDS} to all enemies within {COM_4_RADI_FEET}.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: Arcing Swing
data.description: You sweep your blade out in a wide arc, dealing 84 damage to all enemies 25 feet in front of you, and reducing their Wounds by 75.
data.rawDescription: You sweep your blade out in a wide arc, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies {COM_0_RADI_FEET} in front of you, and reducing their Wounds by {COM_2_VAL0}.

data.name: Banish Darkness
data.description:
Repel Darkness will now send the victim flying even further away from you.
If wearing a Great Weapon it will also cool down 50% faster.
data.rawDescription:
Repel Darkness will now send the victim flying even further away from you.
If wearing a Great Weapon it will also cool down {COM_0_VAL0}% faster.

data.name: Bellow Commands
data.description: Battle Commands will restore 5 action points every second for each of your active Battle Commands.
data.rawDescription: Battle Commands will restore 5 action points every second for each of your active Battle Commands.

data.name: Biting Blade
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, they will suffer an additional 350 damage over 10 seconds and their parry chance will be reduced by 5%.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy, they will suffer an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS} and their parry chance will be reduced by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Blazing Blade
data.description: The force of the sun fills your blade, dealing 105 damage to the enemy and the victim will also suffer 192 Elemental damage over the next 9 seconds. This effect is stackable up to three times.
data.rawDescription: The force of the sun fills your blade, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to the enemy and the victim will also suffer {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This effect is stackable up to three times.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.
data.rawDescription: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only {COM_5_VAL0}% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after {COM_5_DURA_SECONDS} or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.
data.rawDescription:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Coordination
data.description: Shield Rush will now also increase your chance to parry by 15%.
data.rawDescription: Shield Rush will now also increase your chance to parry by {ABIL_8011_COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Crippling Blow
data.description: A cruel slash at your victim's legs which deals 134 damage and snares them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A cruel slash at your victim's legs which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and snares them, reducing their run speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces your target's armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A powerful melee attack that reduces your target's armor by {COM_1_VAL0} and deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Dirty Tricks
data.description: When you block, all members of your group within 100 feet except you will gain a 5% chance to critically hit for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: When you block, all members of your group within 100 feet except you will gain a {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% chance to critically hit for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, reducing their damage to {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Efficient Swings
data.description: Detaunts are dispelled automatically when applied to you.
data.rawDescription: Detaunts are dispelled automatically when applied to you.

data.name: Emperor's Champion
data.description: Increases your Strength, Toughness, and Wounds by 240 for 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength, Toughness, and Wounds by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, which will absorb up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Overpowering Swing
data.description: Arcing Swing will now additionally make enemies 10% more likely to be critically hit.
data.rawDescription: Arcing Swing will now additionally make enemies {ABIL_8026_COM_3_VAL1}% more likely to be critically hit.

data.name: Flawless Defense
data.description: Increase the chances to block, dodge, parry, and disrupt attacks by 50% for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: Increase the chances to block, dodge, parry, and disrupt attacks by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} for all group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mending
data.description: Stay Focused! will now also cause groupmates in the area to receive 15% more from all healing effects used on them.
data.rawDescription: Stay Focused! will now also cause groupmates in the area to receive {ABIL_8020_COM_5_VAL1}% more from all healing effects used on them.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you {COM_2_VAL1}% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Gather Your Resolve!
data.description:
You order your group to steady their thoughts, increasing all resistances by 236 for all groupmates within 100 feet. All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, reducing their resistances by 118.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
You order your group to steady their thoughts, increasing all resistances by {COM_3_VAL0} for all groupmates within {COM_3_RADI_FEET}. All enemies within {COM_4_RADI_FEET} will be frightened, reducing their resistances by {COM_4_VAL0}.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: Gilded Shield
data.description: Increases your chance to disrupt attacks by 15% as long as you're holding a shield.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to disrupt attacks by {COM_0_VAL0}% as long as you're holding a shield.

data.name: Guard
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.
data.rawDescription:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and {COM_1_VAL1}% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Guardian of Light
data.description: You become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 3600 damage.
data.rawDescription: You become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} which will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Heaven's Fury
data.description: A blazing aura of light surrounds your blade as you bring it around in a broad sweep, dealing 80 Elemental damage to all enemies in front of you up to 40 feet away.  Everyone hit by this attack will be staggered, and unable to move for 5 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.
data.rawDescription: A blazing aura of light surrounds your blade as you bring it around in a broad sweep, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} to all enemies in front of you up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.  Everyone hit by this attack will be staggered, and unable to move for {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by {COM_1_VAL0}% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by {COM_0_VAL1}% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.
data.rawDescription: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Laurels of Victory
data.description: Vigilance will no longer reduce the damage you deal.
data.rawDescription: Vigilance will no longer reduce the damage you deal.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.
data.rawDescription: Enemy monsters will hate you {COM_0_VAL1}% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Myrmidia's Fury
data.description: You slam into your target without remorse, dealing up to 570 damage over 3 seconds.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You slam into your target without remorse, dealing up to {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: No Escape
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and roots them, making them unable to move for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} and roots them, making them unable to move for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Nova Strike
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away, and an additional 804 damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away, and an additional {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Now's Our Chance!
data.description:
You fill your enemies with fear and doubt, causing all healing abilities to become 75% as effective when used by any enemies within 30 feet of you.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
You fill your enemies with fear and doubt, causing all healing abilities to become {COM_3_VAL1}% as effective when used by any enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of you.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: On Your Guard!
data.description:
You order your group to ready their defenses, causing 150 damage back against any attacker who strikes a groupmate within 100 feet with a melee attack. Targets can only be damaged once every two seconds.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
You order your group to ready their defenses, causing {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} back against any attacker who strikes a groupmate within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} with a melee attack. Targets can only be damaged once every two seconds.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: Perseverance
data.description: The blessings of Myrmidia fill you, increasing your Armor by 618 for 10 seconds.  Whenever you're attacked during this time, you will regain 10 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: The blessings of Myrmidia fill you, increasing your Armor by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  Whenever you're attacked during this time, you will regain {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.name: Precision Strike
data.description: A careful strike that deals 159 damage, and ignores 25% of the victim's armor.
data.rawDescription: A careful strike that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and ignores 25% of the victim's armor.

data.name: Press The Attack!
data.description:
You order your group to strike fiercely, increasing Strength by 75 for all groupmates within 100 feet. All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, reducing their Strength by 75.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.
data.rawDescription:
You order your group to strike fiercely, increasing Strength by {COM_3_VAL0} for all groupmates within {COM_3_RADI_FEET}. All enemies within {COM_4_RADI_FEET} will be frightened, reducing their Strength by {COM_4_VAL0}.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: Raze
data.description: You repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: You repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, up to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Repel Darkness
data.description: The power of the sun blasts your enemy away, dealing 159 damage and knocking them away from you.
data.rawDescription: The power of the sun blasts your enemy away, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocking them away from you.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases Toughness by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Runefang
data.description: Whenever you parry an attack, your Toughness and Weapon Skill will be increased by 100 for 10 seconds. This effect will not refresh itself.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you parry an attack, your Toughness and Weapon Skill will be increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. This effect will not refresh itself.

data.name: Shackle
data.description: Your cowardly enemies are forced to face your wrath.  Up to 4 enemies within 30 feet are rooted in place, making them unable to move for 5 seconds.  Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.
data.rawDescription: Your cowardly enemies are forced to face your wrath.  Up to 4 enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} are rooted in place, making them unable to move for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Shatter Confidence
data.description: You crush your enemy's will, removing 1 Enchantment from them.  If an Enchantment is successfully removed, then the victim will also suffer 184 damage.
data.rawDescription: You crush your enemy's will, removing {COM_0_VAL1} Enchantment from them.  If an Enchantment is successfully removed, then the victim will also suffer {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.description: The heat of the very sun itself surrounds you for 10 seconds, dealing 100 Elemental damage back to anyone that attacks you.
data.rawDescription: The heat of the very sun itself surrounds you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} back to anyone that attacks you.

data.rawDescription: A powerful forward slam with your shield which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy, and increases your chance to block by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Shield Wall

data.rawDescription: For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Shining Blade

data.rawDescription: Your Shining Blade slices into your opponent for {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.  For the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, Shining Blade will cause an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} on the next damaging attack made by everyone in your group within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.
data.rawDescription: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0} hit points as well.

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}.  Enemy players hit by this effect will lose all of their Morale. This ability hits max 9 targets.

data.description: Myrmidia's power bursts forth from you, slamming into all enemies within 30 feet.  All of the victims will suffer 220 damage over 10 seconds and have their chance to defend attacks reduced by 10%.

data.name: Stand Strong!
data.description:
You order your group to hold their positions, increasing Toughness by 75 for all groupmates within 100 feet. All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, reducing their Toughness by 75.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: Stay Focused!
data.description:
You order your group to prepare for combat, causing all of your groupmates within 100 feet to regain 90 health over 3 seconds any time they defend themselves against an attack.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and making monsters hate you more.While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: To Glory!
data.description:
You fill your group with purpose, causing all of your groupmates within 100 feet to regain 20 Action Points every 5 seconds. All enemies within 30 feet will lose 20 Action Points every 5 seconds.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.name: To Victory!
data.description:
You order your group to steady themselves, making it 25% less likely that your groupmates within 100 feet will become set back if they're hit while using an ability. All enemies within 30 feet will be frightened, making it 25% more likely that they'll be set back when hit.
The Battle Command will last until its toggled off. You can have up to 3 Battle Commands active at the same time.

data.description: Smashing Counter, Shield Rush, and Vicious Slash no longer cost action points.
data.rawDescription: Smashing Counter, Shield Rush, and Vicious Slash no longer cost action points.
